name: Black Diamond Big Air XP Belay Device Package
categories: Big Air XP Belay Device Package
description: Futuristic friction and a classic design are blended in this versatile ATC package. The belay device offers 3 times the friction as earlier models, for hang-dogging or involved rappels. Includes a mini pear-shaped locking carabiner with a large rope-bearing surface for smooth raps and lowering.Design is 30% lighter than previous models.Reversible design has high and regular friction modes.Windowed body shaves grams without sacrificing strength.Proven cable design maintains shape and steers clear of rope tangles.Carabiner has a keylock nose to prevent snagging.Sleeve locks on carabiner's gate (not nose), so won't freeze up when loaded.
